dcterms:creator: U.V. Marti
H. Bunke
dcterms:description: The IAM handwriting dataset includes the forms of handwritten text, which can be used for training and testing purposes of text recognition experiments. It supports paragraph and line level segmentation.
dcterms:title: IAM

dcterms:creator: E. Grosicki
H. El-Abed
dcterms:description: The RIMES dataset is a collection of handwritten letters sent by individuals to company administrators. It is used for training, validation, and testing in handwriting recognition tasks.
dcterms:title: RIMES

dcterms:creator: J.A. SÃ¡nchez
V. Romero
A.H. Toselli
E. Vidal
dcterms:description: The READ-2016 dataset is presented in the ICFHR 2016 competition and includes handwritten text in the German language. It provides page, paragraph, and line level segmentation.
dcterms:title: READ-2016
